languages.text: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, poison, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}隐忍待发{/g}时，会立刻按照以下优先度移除一项负面效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}中毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用隐忍待发时，会立刻按照以下优先度移除一项负面效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、中毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。
当装备者使用隐忍待发时，会立刻按照以下优先度移除一项负面效果：{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、中毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}。

languages.text: При применении способности Стойкость с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При использовании Стойкости с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

При использовании Стойкости с персонажа немедленно снимается один из следующих эффектов в указанном порядке: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が耐久を使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の順番で、直ちに効果を1つ取り除く。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Endure, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が耐久を使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、毒、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}の順番で直ちに効果の1つを取り除く。

languages.text: Si el portador usa {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Aguantar{/g}, elimina al instante uno de los efectos que sufra en el siguiente orden: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador usa Aguantar, elimina al instante uno de los efectos que sufra en el siguiente orden: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, veneno, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Ertragen{/g} einsetzt, entfernt er sofort einen Effekte in folgender Reihenfolge: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger Ertragen nutzt, entfernt er sofort einen der Effekte auf sich in folgender Reihenfolge: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, Gift, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à l'effet {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Supporter{/g}, l'un des effets dont il est la cible se dissipe immédiatement (dans l'ordre : {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}).
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à l'effet Supporter, l'un des effets dont il est la cible se dissipe immédiatement (dans l'ordre : {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, Toxine et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}).

Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à l'effet Supporter, l'un des effets dont il est la cible se dissipe immédiatement (dans l'ordre : {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, Toxine et {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}).

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Sebat{/g} kullandığında üzerindeki etkilerden birini şu sırayla kaldırır: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
